backend/main.mo: Defines response and error types for an actor canister, including base64 image data and status codes.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented UI features, their associated frontend files, components, and test IDs for tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregates high-level summaries of major frontend files, describing their roles and behaviors in the app.
frontend/.env: Sets local environment variables for the caricature API URL and API key.
frontend/.env.example: Provides example environment variable configuration for Razorpay and the caricature API.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and color variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/README.md: Introductory documentation describing app features, tech stack, and project structure.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controller managing global providers, screen navigation, and authentication-based route guards.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Simple centered layout wrapper enforcing a max-width container.
frontend/src/components/ArtStyleSelect.t: Select component rendering four art style options with required values and labels.
frontend/src/components/ErrorNotificatio: Stub component for payment errors that renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/PhotoInput.tsx: Manages image selection, camera capture, previewing, and emitting selected photo data to parent components.
frontend/src/components/SuccessNotificat: Displays a styled success message indicating payment completion.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Top bar UI with theme toggle, language selector, and logout button using auth and i18n hooks.
frontend/src/config/env.ts: Loads environment variables for Razorpay and caricature API with fallbacks and helper checks.
Local auth context handling signup, login, logout, and session persistence using localStorage and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/features/generation/generat: Defines types for caricature generation input and result.
frontend/src/features/generation/useCari: Hook that uploads an image and style to the caricature API, handles responses, and stores results locally.
frontend/src/features/i18n/i18n.ts: Contains supported languages and translation dictionaries for UI text.
frontend/src/features/i18n/useI18n.tsx: i18n context providing current language, setter, and translation lookup with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/features/payment/razorpayPl: Placeholder Razorpay initializer that logs warnings unless configured.
frontend/src/features/payment/useMockPay: Mock payment hook that simulates a successful payment and marks it in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/pricing/useRegiona: Fetches user region to select a localized price and caches it in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/theme/useTheme.tsx: Theme context managing light/dark mode with localStorage sync and DOM class toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing login state helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark theme styling.
frontend/src/lib/downloadPng.ts: Utilities to download images or SVGs as PNG by rendering them to a canvas and triggering a file download.
frontend/src/lib/storage.ts: Wrapper functions for safely getting, setting, and removing JSON data in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/uiStyles.ts: Exports standardized Tailwind class strings for cards, buttons, inputs, and labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/AuthScreen.tsx: Renders login and signup UI with local auth logic, validation, and toast notifications.
Handles photo upload, style selection, mock payment, and triggering caricature generation with stored input support.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Displays the landing page with sample images, branding, and a start button.
frontend/src/screens/ResultScreen.tsx: Displays the generated caricature, allows downloading the PNG, toggling the source photo, and starting a new generation.
frontend/src/screens/UploadPhotoScreen.t: Handles photo upload and style selection, triggers caricature generation, and shows status and download options based on results.
frontend/src/screens/UploadScreen.tsx: Intro screen explaining upload instructions and providing a button to continue to the photo upload flow.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
